UserName.title: Account user name
UserName.description: The user name with the optional domain (e.g "user" or "domain\user").

EmailAddress.title: Account email address
EmailAddress.description: The email address for the account (e.g. "john@company.com).

Password.title: Account password
Password.description: The password of the user account.

IdentificationUUID.title: IdentificationUUID
IdentificationUUID.description: The UUID of the Identification Payload to use as the source for user values.

Host.title: Internal Exchange Host
Host.description: The IP address or fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the internal Exchange host.

Port.title: Internal Exchange Host Port
Port.description: The port on which to connect to the internal Exchange host.

Path.title: Internal server path
Path.description: The server path for the internal Exchange host.

SSL.title: Use SSL for Internal Exchange Host
SSL.description: Send all communication through Secure Socket Layer.

ExternalHost.title: External Exchange Host
ExternalHost.description: The IP address or fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the external Exchange host.

ExternalPort.title: External Exchange Host Port
ExternalPort.description: The port on which to connect to the external Exchange host.

ExternalPath.title: External server path
ExternalPath.description: The server path for the external Exchange host.

ExternalSSL.title: Use SSL for External Exchange Host
ExternalSSL.description: Send all communication through Secure Socket Layer.

OAuth.title: Use OAuth
OAuth.description: Specifies whether the connection should use OAuth for authentication.

OAuthSignInURL.title: OAuth Sign-In URL
OAuthSignInURL.description: URL to load into a webview for authentication via OAuth when auto-discovery is not used.
